resources.string: Mount SD as ext4 on boot
For some reason the modification failed. Please check logcat for further information.
For some reason the modification failed. Please check logcat for further information. Do you use any othet kernel/CPU tweak app?
Interactive changes succesfully applied. If you enabled Set On Boot, make sure that the app has right to Autostart in MIUI Security.
System partition modified. You need to reboot for the changes to take effect

You are about to modify the touchboost values. This means modifying a file on your system partition. If you do this, from now on the new values will be used until you update your ROM, or restore the values.
Your phone is not rooted, or you didn\'t give permission to this app. Without root permission, this app will not work.
You are not using SuperSU, that means some functions will not work (e.g. SD ext4 mount). Please consider using SuperSU.

This will format your SD Card, and erase all data on it! Only continue if you made backup, and know what your are doing!\nIf you are using SuperSU, make sure you have disabled \"Mount namespace separation\" in its settings!
mke2fs not found! Do you have busybox installed?
SD card formatted, mounted, and set for auto-mount on each reboot. Please check if you have enabled autostart for this app!
Couldn\'t umount /mnt/media/rw/sdcard1. Please stop every other applications. If the problem persists, make a reboot.
Couldn\'t umount /storage/sdcard1. Please stop every other applications. If the problem persists, make a reboot.
Couldn\'t read touchboost values!\nIf you are NOT using MIUI, don\'t worry about this.
You are not using interactive governor. This app can only work with interactive governor.
You are probably using another tweak app that prevents me from changing governor.
Touchboost values are different then your settings! Please open the app, and press Save!
There was an error installing busybox binary.
This can really take a minute...
Profile (From the slowest response to the fastest)
SlowRamp - Default, might be better for gaming
QuickRamp - Experimental, better for AOSP/CyanogenMod and battery overall
There was an error flashing recovery, please try again.
Converting success (If there was any backup)
Convert failed or backups not found
If you see this message for more than a few seconds, please check if you have root, and enabled Redmi Note 2 Tool!
Recovery files needed to be downloaded, please wait...
There was an error trying to download recovery.\nPlease try again later!
Please push the recovery flash button again!
